channel.title: Compiling error....please help!
channel.description:
Okay....i just installed the new jdk...6u4 and now i get a weird error yes...i did change the envoiromental variables ( maybe someone can post me them to show me if mines right?) well heres the error....
[code] javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options
Complete!
press enter to close [/code]
Thankyou and im sorry to be such a pain....or noob.... :o

item.title: Compiling error....please help!
